mod.name: faithful texture pack (redwood edition)
mod.description: this installs the faithful texture pack customised for our mods.

mod.name: minecraftforge
mod.description: this is the api that all mods in the pack need to work

mod.name: codechickencore
mod.description: needed to run the best recipe finder in minecraft!

mod.name: aromacore
mod.description: this is a library for aroma's mods.

mod.name: dynmap
mod.description: this mod generates maps of the worlds and enables people to chat with people ingame.

mod.name: autoutils
mod.description: this is a library for automatic_maiden's mods.

mod.name: notenoughitems
mod.description: the best recipe finder in minecraft!

mod.name: optifine
mod.description: allows you to customize graphic settings to get a cleaner running minecraft

mod.name: novoidfog
mod.description: allows you to disable void fog while near bedrock when not using optifine.

mod.name: forestry
mod.description: adds numerous things from farms to bees in minecraft

mod.name: archimedesships
mod.description: this mod allows you to build both water and airbourne ships.

mod.name: arsmagica2
mod.description: a mod that adds cool magic spells items and research.

mod.name: armorstatushud
mod.description: this mod provides an overlay to show that status of your armour.

mod.name: tukmc
mod.description: this mod overhauls the ui to look like the tukui from world of warcraft.

mod.name: backpacks
mod.description: this mod adds special backpacks for carrying items, crafting and more.

mod.name: buffbarmod
mod.description: this mod adds a bar showing buffs and their durations.

mod.name: bspkrscore
mod.description: this mod is a library that is a dependency for armorstatushud and other mods by bspkrs.

mod.name: backtools
mod.description: makes players last equipped items appear on their back (looks cool with weapons!).

mod.name: chatbubbles
mod.description: adds chat bubbles above peoples heads when they speak.

mod.name: damageindicators
mod.description: addon to provide rpg like health meters for mobs and players.

mod.name: deathcounter
mod.description: addon to keep track of how many times players die.

mod.name: deadlyworld
mod.description: addon that makes the world more difficult. silverfish veins etc.

mod.name: oreconverter
mod.description: adds various tools for converting types of ores in the ore dictionary.

mod.name: eirairc
mod.description: irc client for in minecraft.

mod.name: inventorytweaks
mod.description: adds tweaks to allow sorting of your inventory and chests.

mod.name: schematica
mod.description: adds the ability to show schematic files in game as a ghost like overlay.

mod.name: notenoughkeys
mod.description: a very simple mod created to clean up and organize the keybinds gui, organizing mods into their own category and sub menu.

mod.name: nosoundlag
mod.description: makes block break sounds client side rather than server.

mod.name: shatter
mod.description: mobs shatter when you kill them.

mod.name: mousetweaks
mod.description: adds additional mouse inventory shortcuts.

mod.name: mobiuscore
mod.description: dependency required for opis

mod.name: mapwriter
mod.description: addon that allows you to map the world by exploration. provides minimap and large map of world ingame.

mod.name: opis
mod.description: mapwriter with a profiler built in. only for use by admins/ops.

mod.name: voxelmap
mod.description: addon to provide a minimap.

mod.name: translocator
mod.description: this mod adds translocators for moving items between inventories.

mod.name: vending
mod.description: this mod adds trading posts for trading items for other items.

mod.name: denlib
mod.description: dependency for various mods.

mod.name: denpipes
mod.description: add on to buildcraft to add more pipes and new options to gates.

mod.name: pluginsforforestry
mod.description: add on to forestry which aims to better integrate forestry with other mods.

mod.name: balkonsweaponmod
mod.description: adds cool weapons.

mod.name: bibliowoods[forestry]
mod.description: adds ability to make bibliocraft blocks from the new forestry woods.

mod.name: bibliowoods[natura]
mod.description: adds ability to make bibliocraft blocks from the natura woods.

mod.name: bibliowoods[extrabiomesxl]
mod.description: adds ability to make bibliocraft blocks from the extrabiomesxl woods.

mod.name: discocraft
mod.description: adds 6 new records, a disco dance floor and functioning disco ball.

mod.name: finndusfillies
mod.description: horses now drop horse meat and you can now make slime balls from leather.

mod.name: chococraft
mod.description: adds chocobos and other chocobo related items.

mod.name: extrabiomesxl
mod.description: extra biomes for world generation.

mod.name: morerecords-core
mod.description: adds more records to the game.

mod.name: morerecords-poppack
mod.description: adds more records to the game.

mod.name: gregslighting
mod.description: adds a flood light for lighting large areas.

mod.name: advancedpowermanagement
mod.description: adds charging benches, storage monitors and adjustable transformers for ic2.

mod.name: secretroomsmod
mod.description: adds special blocks to enable you to hide / disguise things.

mod.name: magicbees
mod.description: addon for forestry to add magic bees.

mod.name: binniesmods
mod.description: adds extra bees and extra trees to forestry.

mod.name: carpenter'sblocks
mod.description: this mod adds sloped blocks.

mod.name: chargepads
mod.description: adds pads for charging ic2 tools.

mod.name: chesttransporter
mod.description: adds a tool to move chests.

mod.name: railcraft
mod.description: adds a lot of new tracks and carts to minecraft as well as a new steam system

mod.name: steve'scarts2
mod.description: adds more carts to minecraft that will do all sorts of jobs for you!

mod.name: ironchests
mod.description: different sized chests that only take up one block!

mod.name: enderstorage
mod.description: you can create a network of chests, viewable from anywhere in the minecraft world and beyond!

mod.name: bibliocraft
mod.description: finally we get a very nice storage mod for your tools, armor and more!

mod.name: tinkersconstruct
mod.description: a new way to smelt and create tools!

mod.name: appliedenergistics
mod.description: adds in a cool way of storing items electrically!

mod.name: extracells
mod.description: adds huge storage cells into applied energistics

mod.name: extendedfuels
mod.description: adds more fuels into minecraft!

mod.name: dartcraft
mod.description: this mod adds engines, ores and upgradable backpacks! amongst other awesome stuff

mod.name: natura
mod.description: this mod adds natural world gen, berry bushes and new trees!

mod.name: hardcoreenderexpansion
mod.description: this mod extends the end to make it more than just an island, enjoy death... i mean the adventure.

mod.name: dimensionalworld
mod.description: this mod adds a mining dimension (no op dense ores just a world to mine in to keep overworld tidy).

mod.name: forgemultipart
mod.description: allows you to chop up blocks and place them together!

mod.name: codechickenlib
mod.description: library used by many mods.

mod.name: wr-cbe
mod.description: adds a way to allow you to have wireless redstone!

mod.name: keithyutils
mod.description: adds a tonne of new ores, new blocks, new machines and general metallurgy goodies

mod.name: metallurgy
mod.description: adds a tonne of new ores, new blocks, new machines and general metallurgy goodies

mod.name: dynamicliquidtanks
mod.description: adds tanks you can disguise as anything you like!

mod.name: render player api - forge
mod.description: the player render api for ultimate nether mod!

mod.name: netherstuffs
mod.description: adds more trees and loads of cool items using the nether as a base!

mod.name: aquaculture
mod.description: adds more things in the sea, just as it should be!

mod.name: craftingsuite
mod.description: a mod that adds new level of customisation to crafting tables.

mod.name: bettergrassandleaves
mod.description: make minecraft look a bit different with this grass and leaves mod!

mod.name: mystcraft
mod.description: adds a way of creating your own custom world!

mod.name: randomthings
mod.description: adds a bunch of really neat items and blocks to make your life easier!

mod.name: extrautilities
mod.description: blocks and items that serve useful purposes.

mod.name: magicyarn
mod.description: adds magic yarn that can be used to find your way back to entrances of mines and caves (hopefully never get lost again!).

mod.name: animationapi
mod.description: addon that adds mutant versions of mobs.

mod.name: mutantcreatures
mod.description: addon that adds mutant versions of mobs.

mod.name: neiaddons
mod.description: this mod adds recipes for mods that do not natively support nei.

mod.name: waila
mod.description: this is an addon for nei to enable you to find out what mod an item or block is from.

mod.name: neiplugins
mod.description: this mod adds recipes for mods that do not natively support nei.

mod.name: obsidiplates
mod.description: adds special pressure pads that do not react to mobs.

mod.name: openblocks
mod.description: adds more cool blocks and items.

mod.name: paintersflowerpot
mod.description: adds more types of flower pots and allows more plants to be placed in them.

mod.name: ichunutil
mod.description: this mod is a shared library required by a couple of ichuns mods. made for minecraft 1.5 or later

mod.name: portalgun
mod.description: adds a portal gun and portal related items.

mod.name: redstoneinmotion
mod.description: adds the ability to move land based on redstone signal.

mod.name: ropesplus
mod.description: adds grapling hooks and ropes to clime up / down.

mod.name: switches
mod.description: adds a redstone switch (alternative to a lever).

mod.name: jabba
mod.description: adds improved upgradable barrels and a 'dolly' which can be used to move various blocks without having to destroy them.

mod.name: twilightforest
mod.description: adds a new dimension... the twilight forest.

mod.name: morph
mod.description: allows you to change the shape and appearance of yourself!

mod.name: billund
mod.description: lego and minecraft finally meet!

mod.name: chisel
mod.description: you can now create all sorts of decorative blocks!

mod.name: supercraftingframe
mod.description: a special kind of frame...that crafts!

mod.name: buildcraft
mod.description: automation in minecraft. adds pipes, quarries and lots lots more!

mod.name: bigreactors
mod.description: adds the ability to make cool multiblock reactors that create buildcraft power.

mod.name: additionalbuildcraftobjects
mod.description: giving you more pipes to work with in buildcraft

mod.name: additionalbuildcraftpipes
mod.description: giving you more pipes to work with in buildcraft

mod.name: enderio
mod.description: this mod adds multi pipes and the ender io.

mod.name: gatecopy
mod.description: allows you to create a clipboard for copying settings between buildcraft gates.

mod.name: logisticspipes
mod.description: adds buildcraft pipes capable of requesting items from remote inventories and automatically crafting.

mod.description: adds programmable computers to minecraft

mod.name: computercraft

mod.description: adds more peripherals for computercraft.

mod.description: adds the ability to trigger and read redstone via computercraft networks.

mod.description: library for use with openperipherals and openblocks.

mod.name: openperipheralcore
mod.description: adds more peripherals for computercraft and makes most blocks into peripherals.

mod.name: openperipheraladdons
mod.description: adds more peripherals for computercraft and makes most blocks into peripherals.

mod.name: ccadvhttp
mod.description: adds a peripheral block with a better http api for computercraft.

mod.name: ccscanner
mod.description: adds scanner for scanning printed pages and books. you can then interact with the data gained in programs.

mod.name: industrialcraft2
mod.description: industrialize your ore processing and go with some nuclear power!

mod.name: advancedreactors
mod.description: adding in new reactors into ic2!

mod.description: a suit that let's you fly creative style
